forum.hello: Hello! You seem to be interested in this forum, but you haven't registered an account yet.
forum.whenucreate: When you create an account, we will be able to remember exactly what you have read, so you can pick up exactly where you left off.
forum.uwillreceive: You will receive notifications, here or by email, when someone replies to you. You can also "Like" to show your appreciation.
forum.hellops: Hello! You seem to be interested in this post!
forum.whenucreateps: When you create an account, we will be able to remember exactly what you have read and you will receive
forum.uwillreceiveps: notifications, here or by email, when someone replies to you. You can also "Like" to show your appreciation.

admin.afterxpost: Display an alert box After X post
admin.afterxpostdesc: accept number, default is 0 (box will be displayed on top of post streams)
admin.autohide: Auto hide box after X seconds
admin.autohidedesc: use millisecond, e.g for 5 sec use 5000
admin.changetextboxdesc: Here u can set the text for the alert box located BETWEEN POSTS
admin.maintitledesc: Here u can set the Title for the alert box located BETWEEN POSTS
